sect2.title: System.ObjectDisplayName
sect2.para: ObjectDisplayName returns the name of an object. When the ID is specified the DisplayName is resolved from all objects. When the Name is spacified the DisplayName is resolved from the Catalog items.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting:
ID Name DisplayName Description --- ------- ----------- ------------------------------------------------- 994 Boolean Boolean Representation "Boolean" of type "System.Boolean"
Boolean
System.Boolean
